used: You can regain control faster than you think—if you follow a system.
The calmest people win financial battles. Want to become one?
If you treat money like a system, it behaves.
Your accounts are full of clues. Follow them.
There’s always more money in your accounts—you just need the right system to find it.
You’re not behind. You’re just one plan away from ahead.
Timing beats speed in every financial decision.
The first 72 hours after a financial problem are crucial. I’ll show you why.
Bills hit harder when you let them surprise you.
Most bills include fees that shouldn’t be there.
You’re not broke—you’re unorganized. There’s a difference.
